text: Riccardo Lanari is an electrical engineer at Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche (CNR) in Naples, Italy. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to synthetic aperture radar processing. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Italian engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Riccardo Lanari
